plot: Dan must travel back to Christmas Eve 1979 to prevent layoffs at the job.

Dan and his editor are part of the 25% news staff cut back announced by ruthless publisher Dennis Ambaucher on Christmas Eve. He flashes back to 1979, when Dennis succeeded his dad Merrit, who died from cardiac arrest, with Livia, who thinks that's what they must prevent. Dan thinks it's to stop his dad Frank leaving home. Meanwhile his present Christmas party f-holds surprises for his family, including a baby for Jack.—KGF Vissers
